marklogic.body: People who were not there and did not witness what went on are protesting. The police officers, who did arrive at the scene and saw Zimmerman, questioned him and did not arrest him. Why ? If he stated that he was attacked, and there were no signs that was possible, they would have arrested him on the Spot. I don't like to ask this, but ... if Martin had been the neighborhood watch guy and shot Zimmerman... would the media have played it up like this ? Or, if Zimmerman and Martin both had been black ? One other thing... isn't it a coincidence that all of this is playing, just as the Supreme Court is considering Obamacare ? Are they trying to give us something to take our minds Off the fact that Kagan did not recuse herself ? Kind of makes you wonder, doesn't it ?
